recipe.title: Roasted Red Pepper Almond Dip
ingredients: 1/2 inch thick slice crusty bread (about 1/2 cup roughly chopped)
2 roasted red bell peppers, or 1 (12-ounce) jar
instructions: 1. Place the roughly chopped bread in the food processor and pulse for about 30 seconds to chop a little more finely. 2. Add the remaining ingredients to the food processor and pulse until smooth.
1. Place the roughly chopped bread in the food processor and pulse for about 30 seconds to chop a little more finely.
2. Add the remaining ingredients to the food processor and pulse until smooth.
